txt.en: 'Deeds! Get your Adkhât-zahhar, the Houses of Rest Deeds here!\n\n'Talk to me one more time, and they're all yours!'
Adkhât-zahhar, the Houses of Rest Tier 1 & 2 Deeds!
By completing this quest, you will automatically complete the Adkhât-zahhar, the Houses of Rest, tiers 1 and 2 instance deeds.
